data.oai_dc:dc: Surrounding canopy trees were measured for each subplot by recording species ID, distance from subplot, and diameter at breast height (DBH). Basal area was calculated from dbh. Data was recorded May 27–June 5. Each tube was visited, each seedling was identified and marked with a colored pin, and seedling length was measured with a ruler to the nearest 0.1 cm. Each tube was checked for burning. Thatch level was visually recorded into categories by percent cover (and depth for level 4).
establishment limitation|land-use legacies|longleaf pine savanna|plant life stage|root competition|dispersal limitation|canopy thinning|belowground competition|land-use history
